comments.author: Dave
comments.body: In answer to Leeds DATC... Hot! It felt cool when we took off; it ain't now. I picked up a snake-bite puncture going east on Baseline, and by the time I got it repaired the dynamic duo (Bailey, O'Leary), were already in the next time zone. Never saw 'em again. The county crews are repaving 75th - filling old potholes and making new ones, so that would be a good area to avoid until they wrap it up. You can check their official website to see when that will be: leaningonshovelsanddrooling.gov Come ride w/ us sometime!
